description:
Bring your pocketknife’s edge back to life with this compact sharpener. A dull knife is a dangerous knife, with 3 different grit levels Buck’s Flipstik Ultra can do everything from touch ups to re-edging.

  • Diamond grit works well on softer metals and heat-treated tool steels
  • Grit levels: 325 coarse,750 medium, and 1200 fine
  • Collapsible design stores the sharpening rod in the handle when not in use
  • Dimensions, open: 23cm, closed: 12.7cm
name: Buck EdgeTek Ultra FlipStik Pro Diamond Sharpener - Tri-Grit
